item.title: Need Help w/ Shops, yes I used the search button
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

			} else if (NPCID == 523) { //Varrock Robe Shop
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 41; //Varrock Robe Shop

now u need to add that shop to shops.cfg
if the robe shop u need is there make it shop 41 in the shops cfg.

then u need to take it from autospawn and add it with the other shops

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help w/ Shops, yes I used the search button

item.title: Need Help w/ Shops, yes I used the search button
item.dc:creator: @xRYUx xRYUx
item.description:
@xRYUx wrote:

Say I make a robe shop in Ardy and the NPC is a store assistant, then all the store assisstants in runescape sell robes instead of general store items. Help plz.

Here is what my client.java looks like, the other stuff is right

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 523) { //Varrock Robe Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //Varrock Robe Shop } else if (NPCID == 462) { //Varrock Rares Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //Varrock Rares Shop } else if (NPCID == 522 || NPCID == 523) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Varrock General Store } else if (NPCID == 526 || NPCID == 527) { //Shop Keeper + Assistant

Thanks
-Ryu

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help w/ Shops, yes I used the search button
